Jiahao Cai

Who?

I am currently a Ph.D. candidate in the Department of Computer Science, Univeristy of Virginia (U.Va.). I am advised by Prof. Yonghwi Kwon and my research interest lies in Programming Language and Software Security.

Previously, I spent three years (2014 - 2017) in Beijing, China and one year (2017 - 2018) in Halmstad, Sweden.
